channel.title: CVE Feed for On Page SEO + Whatsapp Chat Button -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for On Page SEO + Whatsapp Chat Button -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38332|2024-08-04T01:37:16.379Z -- on%20page%20seo%20%2B%20whatsapp%20chat%20button -- on%20page%20seo%20%2B%20whatsapp%20chat%20button
item.description: The On Page SEO + Whatsapp Chat Button Plugin WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/settings.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.1.
